participant_1.name: Oliver Thompson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Oliver has a competitive edge and values education highly. He tends to be assertive and is always looking for new opportunities in the business world.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Evelyn Carter
participant_2.personality: Friendly and laid-back, Evelyn enjoys sharing stories from her past and is always eager to engage in meaningful conversations. She has a nostalgic view of life and appreciates simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i am a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
